# imageData

**Instance Property**

The data object containing the raw image data.

## Declaration

```swift
var imageData: Data? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property is set using the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKImage/init(imageData:)] method. For image objects created using other methods, this property is `nil`.

## Getting the Image Data

- **image**: The UIKit image object
- **imageName**: The name of the image to load from the Watch app’s bundle.
